synopsis.text: Kei, a high school student, discovers he has the rare ability of immortality after surviving a fatal bus accident. Now known as an 'Ajin', one of only 46 in existence, Kei finds himself hunted by governments and researchers who want to capture him for brutal experiments. On the run, Kei struggles to understand his new identity and powers with the help of his 'Black Ghost', a supernatural entity that aids Ajin. Though once apathetic, Kei must now tap into his ability to fight back against those trying to turn him into a lab experiment. First emerging 17 years ago on African battlefields, Ajin have recently begun appearing among humans, throwing Kei's life into turmoil. With his freedom and future at stake, he is thrust into a battle for survival, hoping to somehow maintain a peaceful existence. Though the road is hard, Kei persists with newfound determination to control his fate.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
